question: 提供
sourceMnemonic: When you <kanji>present</kanji> something to your <kanji>servant</kanji> you're doing them a favor. You're kindly giving them an <vocabulary>offer</vocabulary>. And since they're an aspiring TV star, you're offering <vocabulary>program sponsoring</vocabulary>. You know, so they can make a TV show and fulfil their dream.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
